name: Self Healing OpenStack Solution
short_description:
Skeleton for a Self Healing solution based on the OpenStack Cloud.

This would include documentation and scripts on how to monitor a typical solution (e.g. DB+App+Web Servers) using Nagios or Zabbix, and remediate to failures for Cluod servers by using OpenStack's APIs and Chef or Puppet to spin up and configure additional nodes.

I will start small and then try to scale this to a fully HA solution using only Cloud Servers (which may not be advisable where DB performances can be an issue) and then possibly expand it to different conbinations of products.

Backups will be taken into account eventually and products like Cloud Files (CDN), Cloud Networks, Cloud Block Storage and so on may be added too.

This is only a proof of concept at this stage, and I am yet unsure of what programming language will be used (probably Python).
